name: BDSM Sex - Episode 2
description:
A visual novel series about a young woman exploring the world of BDSM: in this episode, she continues her journey with piss play, suspension bondage, and a drill dildo.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Episode two takes Katy’s exploration to a whole new level, as she delves deeper into the world of BDSM.
The story begins with her locked in a cage and the Master coming to check on her.
Eager to test her limits, he invites her to try various practices and devices on her body.
Stay with Katy as she experiments with the surprising intimacy of piss play, the rush of adrenaline from suspension bondage, the intensity of a drill dildo, and many other things!
We promise you a story with arousing dialogue, realistic-looking characters, and high-definition graphics.

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery
